definitions.definition: The clear blue colour of the sky; also, a pigment or dye of this colour.
A blue colour on a coat of arms , represented in engraving by horizontal parallel lines.
The unclouded sky; the blue vault above.
Any of various widely distributed lycaenid butterflies of the genus Celastrina .
Any of various Australasian lycaenid butterflies of the genus Ogyris .

main_definition: ( countable and uncountable ) The clear blue colour of the sky; also, a pigment or dye of this colour.
secondary_definitions: ( heraldry ) A blue colour on a coat of arms , represented in engraving by horizontal parallel lines.
( poetic ) The unclouded sky; the blue vault above.
Any of various widely distributed lycaenid butterflies of the genus Celastrina .
Any of various Australasian lycaenid butterflies of the genus Ogyris .
